meaningMnemonic: A long time ago a huge <radical>tsunami</radical> swept a <radical>triceratops</radical> up into the <radical>moon</radical> and <kanji>extinguish</kanji>ed its life.
readingMnemonic: This famous event where almost all life was <kanji>extinguish</kanji>ed is reenacted every year for the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう). He's got a bit of an unhealthy obsession with extinguishing life...
